description:
The brand new "HUAWEI Health: Europe" app has been launched to bring the "HUAWEI Health+" membership features to all users across Europe, such as "Workouts", "Yoga", "Mindful Meditation", and "Sleep Music".

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

--------------------
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN
--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

** Top Rating Reproductive Health App ** 
 
Check out the most widely-used period, ovulation & pregnancy tracker, which has been helping to improve the well-being of over 300,000,000 women across 45+ countries in the past decade. 
 
We understand your concerns about your private data security, especially with the recent news.
Here's how we protect your data:
• You can use our app without creating an account.
• You remain COMPLETELY ANONYMOUS while using our app.
• You can DELETE ALL DATA in 1 click whenever you want.
 
At every stage of your life, we safeguard your well-being. 
 
PERIOD & CYCLE CALENDAR
We'll remind you of the dates when your next period starts and ends on time. It's useful whether you have irregular or regular menses. Better? You'll receive tailored PMS advice and instant menstrual pain relief guidance.
 
OVULATION & FERTILITY TRACKER
We help you calculate your most fertile days and analyze your fertility window based on your unique cycle. You can get pregnant naturally ASAP by learning your CHANCE OF CONCEPTION every day.
 
PREGNANCY MODE: WEEK-BY-WEEK 
Follow your baby's weekly growth. Use our due date calculator to find out when your baby's BIG DAY will be and count down it.
 
BIRTH CONTROL PLANNER
Quickly record and stay on track with your contraceptive methods like pills, rings, patches, injections, IUDs, or implants. You can customize the reminder message for individual services.
 
PILL REMINDER
Set start date, interval, durations, and dose quantity for any medication, drugs, or supplements. So you won't forget to take pills when life gets busy.
 
SYMPTOM PREDICTIONS & TIPS
Record your symptoms during any life stage. Get predictions and courses to learn how to deal with them. Take breast self-exam monthly to find abnormalities early.
 
>>Key Features:
- Accurate prediction & reminders of menstruation & the most fertile days 
- Track the cycle lengths, flow intensity, when you are ovulating, birth control methods, etc.
- Log 58 symptoms, 67 moods, and energy levels to know your menstrual pattern
- Track daily chance of getting pregnant with BBT, cervical mucus, ovulation & pregnancy test records
- Baby's due date countdown
- Baby's weekly growth tracker
- Export a health report with charts for self-archive or doctors
- Insights from fertility specialists
- PIN code, Face ID, & Fingerprint lock to protect your private data
- Daily health tracker: weight, hydration, sleep, mood, sex, steps, etc.
- Breast self-exam guidance
- Multiple accounts to track for different, for example, mother/daughter 
- Unlimited app themes & pets
- Available in 39 languages
- Sync data with Apple Health
- Backup and restore data between devices
 
Note: Period Calendar should not be used to replace any form of contraceptive method.
 
Subscription Terms and Details
- Get unlimited access to all features for USD $49.99/year:
	• Cycle predictions for each month
	• Fertility analysis of each day
	• Unlock all self-care content
	• Kegel exercise for women
	• Unlimited app themes and pets
	• Remove ads forever
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
 
If you have any questions or concerns while using our app, please feel free to contact us via feedback in our app ( [Settings] -> [Bug Report&Feedback]) or write to us at abishkking.apple@gmail. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://pc.abishkking.com/privacypolicy.html
Terms of Use: https://pc.abishkking.com/terms.html

developer: Mars Spor Kulubu ve Tesisleri Isletmeciligi Anonim Sirketi
description:
Welcome to the MAC+ World! If you believe in sports, fitness and good living in every moment of your life, you are in the right place.

With MAC+, which is open to the use of everyone aiming for a better life with daily sports exercises, whether in the gym, at home or outside, sports are with you whenever you want, wherever you want! Plus it's completely free!

You are closer to your goals with targeted, ever-growing training programs and a large exercise library prepared by MAC trainers who are experts in their fields. Moreover, the outdoor sports experience with MAC communities is waiting for you with MAC+!

Fitness:
•	Whether you are a newbie or experienced, MAC+ has training programs for all levels.
•	Sport is always with you with its ever-growing training library! You can easily reach your goals with dozens of dynamic workouts suitable for all levels in 9 different categories. Moreover, you can open the doors of a better life with the target-specific fitness programs you wish in 4 different categories, from muscle gain to weight loss.
•	With MAC+, you can do home exercises or train in the gym.
•	If you are experienced in sports, you can design your own training series. You can create a weight loss program according to your goal, and you can include exercises that include many weight loss movements in your program.

Workout Categories:
•	Cardio: Cardio workouts that are essential for bodybuilding and fitness
•	Pilates: Instrument and reformer pilates workouts
•	Core: All core specific workouts
•	HIIT: High-intensity interval workouts when you want to increase the tempo
•	Stretching: Stretching workouts that will increase your sports capacity
•	Yoga: Yoga methods to help you relieve stress and relax
•	Dance: Dance workouts to make you feel better
•	Cycle: Cycle workouts, the most popular workout type of cardio

Extensive Exercise Library:
•	Over 500 exercise videos are waiting for you in MAC+!
•	You can search for exercise you want in the library, and you can create your own workout program by accessing how exercise should be done.

Outdoor Sports Experience with MAC Communities
If do sports is essential for your life, but not within four walls, then MAC communities are just for you! You can come together with MAC communities in different parts of the city and run, cycle together if you wish, or experience different and dynamic trainings outdoors with MAC trainers. Plus it's completely free!

Download MAC+ now, step into a better life!

MAC+ IG: https://www.instagram.com/macfitofficial
MAC+ YT: https://www.youtube.com/MACFitTurkiye

"iHeart - Health at your fingertips

*Important
iHeart is not a substitute for medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. The app is not a medical device and users should always seek the advice of a medical professional before making any medical decisions

Main benefits of the app:

-Heart rate tracking: Track your heart rate in real time and generate a visual table for you to help you better observe heart rate changes

-Daily check-in: Record your daily health check-in, track your habits, help you maintain a regular schedule, and develop a healthier lifestyle.

-Blood pressure and blood sugar log: Support manual recording of health data (such as blood pressure, blood sugar), view history and generate simple charts to facilitate your tracking of daily habits.

-Activity tracker: Develop healthy habits with our habit tracker

The app requires iOS 14.0 or later

Disclaimer: This app is only for manual recording of health data and does not provide any diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any questions, please consult a professional doctor.

Download iHeart now and start your health journey!

About subscription:

developer: Shenzhen Careyou Health Science and Technology Co., LTD
description:
"OKOK International" is an application designed to work with smart Bluetooth weight scales and has successfully helped millions of users efficiently achieve their ideal weight! Through this application, you can use a Bluetooth scale to check and manage various health indicators related to weight, body fat, body water content, and muscle. Additionally, OKOK provides weight records, weight trend analysis to document every change, and supports adding multiple family members' weight.

This application is compatible with Apple's "Health" app, and with your authorization, we can synchronize all weight data to your Health app.

Membership Information:

Payment: If you choose to purchase a membership service, the fee will be charged to your iTunes account.
Subscription Renewal: If you choose automatic subscription, your Apple iTunes account will be automatically charged 24 hours before the expiration, extending the subscription period upon successful payment.

Cancellation of Subscription: To cancel your subscription, manually open your Apple device's "Settings" >>> go to "iTunes & App Store" >>> tap on "Apple ID," select "View Apple ID," enter the "Account Settings" page, tap "Subscriptions," and choose to cancel the OKOK membership. If you do not cancel the subscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, it will automatically renew.

Terms for Paid User Services: https://www.tookok.cn/license/okok/en/member_apple.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.tookok.cn/license/okok/en/privacy.html

For more information about the "OKOK International" application and the services we provide, you can visit http://www.tookok.cn/index_en.html.

Welcome to fatsecret, the easiest to use calorie counter and most effective weight loss and dieting app on the market. Best of all, fatsecret is free.

The app is customised for each country's foods and brands.

Keep track of your food, exercise and weight, using the world's highest quality food and nutrition database and connect with a global community of people looking to make a change for the better and start losing weight and achieve your goals the healthy way. 

The app is available on Apple Watch and supports terrific Complications for your watch faces. 

The app is fully integrated with the Health app which lets you share your data with other Health connected apps. In particular you can:
- sync your Health app calories burned and steps in fatsecret
- add all your foods and their detailed nutritional information to the Health app
- sync your weight to the Health app

fatsecret is fast, simple to use and includes integration with external tools and services to help you succeed with your diet: 
- An easy to use food diary to plan and keep track of what you're eating.
- A wonderful community that's ready to provide support and turbo charge your weight loss.
- Image recognition of foods, meals and products so you can take photos with the camera and track nutrition with pictures. 
- A barcode scanner and auto-complete functions.
- Health app, and Fitbit exercise tracking integration.
- An exercise diary to record all the calories you burn.
- A diet calendar to see your calories consumed and burned.
- A weight tracker.
- Detailed reporting and goals for all your calories and macros.
- Photo album. #Photodiet #Foodsnap #Instacalorie
- A journal to record your progress. 
- Reminders for meals, weigh-ins and journals.
- Notifications for support, comments and followers.
- Fantastic recipes and meal ideas.
- Sharing and interacting with your professional of choice.
- Sign in with Apple, Facebook and Google login.

The app syncs with fatsecret Professional, the most convenient way to share your food, exercise and weight with your preferred health professional. Your health professional will get free access to simple and powerful tools to monitor your performance and provide you with feedback, advice and support.

You can also sync your account online to access your info anywhere, any time.

Premium subscriptions are available for enhanced features to help you achieve your diet and weight management goals. Premium users get:
- Nutritional meal plans created by our dietitian specifically for different diet preferences and calorie goals (Keto Style, Balanced, Mediterranean, Intermittent Fasting, High Protein Low Carb)
- Advanced Meal Planning: plan ahead and know in advance how many calories each meal contains
- Custom Meal Headings: Six additional meal types that allow you to spread your food intake across multiple points in the day
- Water Tracking: so you can make sure you reach a daily water intake goal

If you choose to upgrade to fatsecret Premium, we offer a range of subscription options, including monthly, quarterly, or annually.

Payment will be charged through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period at the same price and subscription type you previously purchased.  

Subscriptions can be managed through your iTunes account after purchase. It is not possible to refund or cancel a subscription during the period.

Terms of Use: https://www.fatsecret.com/Default.aspx?pa=tnc

We hope you'll love Calorie Counter by fatsecret. We are constantly working to improve the app and welcome user feedback.

Welcome to Yazio, the most effective calorie counter, food tracker and intermittent fasting app for losing weight without dieting!
• Rated 4.6 stars based on 300,000+ reviews
• Trusted by 100M+ people
• App of the Day in the App Store
Track calories, eat better and reach your goals with Yazio’s free calorie counter app.
Whether you're working towards a calorie deficit, want to track your meals or just need a smart food tracker, Yazio is your all-in-one solution. Designed to support sustainable weight loss, muscle gain or weight maintenance, Yazio offers a science-backed approach to calorie counting that delivers long-term success without extreme diets.

Calorie counter

Healthy habits & intermittent fasting

Want faster results? Go Pro.
Try Yazio Pro to get advanced features that accelerate your progress.

Upgrade to Pro in the Yazio Calorie Counter App to unlock advanced features and insights. Pro is available as a subscription via in-app purchase and offers better value than other apps with calorie counters, calorie trackers, food trackers or intermittent fasting features.
• App help: http://help.yazio.com
• About our team: https://www.yazio.com/en/about-us
Unlock the ultimate food tracker, calorie counter and healthy eating experience with Yazio!
Help us make the Yazio Calorie Counter App even better as your go-to calorie counter, food tracker and weight loss tool. Have ideas or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you!

- Aren't you tired of trying to guess how many calories are in your meal?
- What about seeing the same meal listed with different calorie counts in other apps?
- Tired of searching, finding, and trying to record them one by one?


**Calorie Tracking in 3 Seconds**

Calorie tracking, losing weight, gaining weight, or maintaining your shape has never been this easy. Just take a photo and easily calculate your calories with artificial intelligence. 

Zinde AI is an app developed for calorie calculation and tracking. We developed an app for ourselves, eliminating the shortcomings and annoying features we saw in calorie calculation apps developed so far. Now we won't have to think about which lahmacun to choose. We won't waste time at the table wondering how many grams something is.


**Features**

- Calorie calculation with photos
- The most comprehensive food database with as many grocery and restaurant items as you want
- No annoying ads
- Calorie, carbohydrate, protein, and fat tracking
- Create new meals
- Easily add past meals
- Track your steps and calories burned with health integration
- Detailed reports for weight loss and weight gain tracking
- Evaluate your diet and progress with clear diagrams

**Pricing**

- A subscription is required to access all features of Zinde AI. 
- After downloading the app, you can choose one of our monthly or yearly plans.
- A free trial period is available for new users.

We will improve our app based on your suggestions and get rid of the old calorie counting apps we are tired of.

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Combining Mi Fitness with smartwatch or smartband devices, users can track their health and fitness data. 

Mi Fitness supported：Xiaomi Watch Series, Redmi Watch Series, Xiaomi Smart Band Series, Redmi Smart Band Series.

Keep track of your workouts
Map your route, monitor your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether it's walking, running, or biking, you can easily track it right from your phone.
Monitor your health information*
Mi Fitness APP assists you in managing your personal health, helping you to always maintain your optimal state. By connecting Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices, important health indicators such as heart rate, sleep, stress, and energy can be monitored and risk warnings generated throughout the day. Health data such as weight and women's health can also be manually recorded and managed.
Sleep better*
In conjunction with Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices that has sleep monitoring functionality, you can record your sleep information every night. By conducting in-depth analysis of the different stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, and rapid eye movement, as well as monitoring your sleep heart rate, breathing quality, body movements, and other sleep-related data, the device generates a personalized sleep report. This report can help remind you to adjust your sleep habits in a timely manner.
Easy payments with wearable device
Link your Mastercard cards to Mi Fitness and enjoy the convenience of making payments on the go with your wearable device.
Ask Alexa for convenient access
With Alexa, you can easily access important features like checking the weather, playing music, and starting a workout. Just ask and you're good to go.
Stay informed with notifications
Receive notifications, messages, and emails directly on your wearable device, so you can stay informed without having to constantly check your phone.

*Disclaimer
Except for the manual health information recording service provided to users, all other health services within the application only synchronize and record the relevant information of the wristband or watch. All health-related data, results, suggestions, etc. are for reference only and are not intended for medical purposes, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only used for general fitness and health purposes.
Please note that all smartwatches/fitness trackers currently integrated into the application are not medical devices and cannot provide any form of medical services. In case of any physical discomfort, please seek timely advice from medical institutions.

developer: BEIJE MEDIKAL URUNLER PAZARLAMA SANAYI VE TICARET ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
“bej, beige, beje, biji, beiji, beıje, bejle, beij, beji, bejje, beijie”... Nasıl okursan oku; beije sadece regl döneminde değil, her zaman seninle!

1. Takvim İle Reglini Takip Et
Reglini ve günlük deneyimlerini sana özel takvime gir, döngünün zihinsel ve fiziksel etkilerini fark et. 

2. Döngünü Analiz Et
Senin verilerinle, senin için hazırlanmış analizinin yardımıyla döngünü yakından tanı. Verilerine göre güncellenen gelecek tahminleriyle kolayca plan yap!

3. Özel Bildirimler ve Hatırlatıcılar
Bildirimleri aç, önemli hiçbir detayı ve tarihi kaçırma!

4. Bilim Temelli Rehber İçerikler
Tamamen bilimsel kaynaklardan oluşturduğumuz rehberler ile birçok soruna cevap bulabilir, ihtiyacın olan içerikleri kaydedebilirsin.

5. Apple Sağlık ile Senkronize Et
beije App, Apple Sağlık uygulaması ile uyumlu çalışır. Böylece, tüm verilerini tek bir yerde toplayabilirsin.

Burayı; döngünü ve bedenini daha yakından tanıyabileceğin, güvenilir ve temiz bilgilere her an ulaşabileceğin, tamamen sana özel ve daha “iyi” bir regl deneyimi oluşturabileceğin bir alan olarak, büyük bir özenle tasarladık. Bir an önce aramıza katılman için çok heyecanlıyız!

Sağlıklı ve mutlu yaşam danışmanı misyonu ile sadece senCard üyelerine özel fark yaratan ayrıcalıklara ücretsiz olarak kolayca ulaşabilir, ihtiyaçlarınızı yönetebilirsiniz.
 
senCard Mobil Uygulaması ile sağlık poliçenize ait detayları görüntüleyebilir, medikal hizmet ağına ulaşabilir, provizyonlarınızı takip edebilir, fatura geri ödeme işlemlerini yapabilir ve Blua dijital sağlık uygulaması kapsamında sunulan hizmetlere kolaylıkla erişebilirsiniz.
 
senCard üyesi olmadan da uygulama üzerinden nöbetçi eczane ve en yakın sağlık kurumunu görüntüleyebilir, ambulans çağırabilir, senCard Market’e giriş yapabilir ve sağlıklı yaşam ipuçlarından faydalanabilirsiniz.

https://www.sencard.com.tr

Are you ready to get acquainted with the digital assistant that women prefer and love the most?
* More than 5 million women use it!
* App of the day on AppStore!

I'm Pepapp, I'm here to make your life easier and more enjoyable. I am so much more than just a menstrual calendar. From the first day you downloaded it, I am both entertaining and informing you with my recommendations every day. What else am I doing? Let's take a look!

Menstrual Calendar
Each woman's menstrual cycle is unique to her. And every woman can be in different moods during this period. But of course, everyone wants to feel good and safe. I try to predict and help you track your PMS, period, fertility and ovulation periods in the most accurate way. I give important advices for you to spend these periods more comfortably and to experience the symptoms in the lightest way. I have a very simple usage and I try to make correct predictions thanks to my artificial intelligence. I offer opportunities such as discharge level, sexual intercourse tracking, birth control, adding symptoms, getting advice about symptoms, keeping diary notes, and encryption.

Pregnancy Mode
I have developed a pregnancy mode for you to make your motherhood journey more enjoyable. If you want to get pregnant, I guide you through this process by determining the days when your fertility is highest. It allows you to follow the growth of your baby week by week during pregnancy, and I give you the most accurate information in this process.

AstroPep
I am opening the mysterious doors of the zodiac with my daily horoscope comments. Every day, I give special astro advice for your sign and update my comments according to special sky movements. By the way, you can't find my astrology interpretations anywhere else, I didn't want to go without saying. ;)

Special Cards for You and Your Period
With the cards on my assistant screen, I provide important information according to your period and symptoms, and I make good suggestions for you. That's why it's so important that you visit me every day and enter your symptoms correctly. Apart from these, I have many different cards that will make you laugh, think and I will compliment and surprise you during the day. In short, all these cards are here to make you happy and feel better!

Daily Notifications and Reminders
I make your day better with notifications I send to your phone. You will understand very well how close we are thanks to my notifications. I also notify you by sending notifications about your upcoming periods. For this, it is enough to turn on notifications from the settings section.

Pepzine: Lifestyle and Blog
The name of my blog is Pepzine. You will love this place. Choose the category you are interested in, start exploring! You can find informative articles on many topics and content that you will have a lot of fun reading. This is a huge library of happiness!

Premium Feature
You can go premium to make your Pepapp experience more special and useful. When you upgrade to this version, you can enjoy an ad-free experience, thousands of tips and content tailored for you!

Synchronized with Apple Health
Pepapp works in harmony with the Apple Health application, I support you to collect all your data in one place. You can follow your menstrual cycle simultaneously from both applications.

Come on, isn't it time to meet?

---

For more information please visit the link https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

Privacy Policy: https://letspepapp.com/pepapp-privacy-policy/

Terms of Use: https://letspepapp.com/pepapp-terms-of-use/


Pepapp uses HealthKit to export your Pepapp activities to the Health app and to read menstrual cycle data.


Pepapp’s predictions should not be used as a form of birth control/contraception.


support@letspepapp.com

Track your baby's sleep, feeding, diaper changes, pumping, and mood.

Now you have an assistant on your journey to mindful parenting – trusted by 1,000,000+ moms and dads! Grow Together. Every Step of the Way.

GROWTH CRISES CALENDAR
From birth up to 2 years, a child goes through several growth and development crises. There's no need to be worried – this is a natural process during which the nervous system and brain develop, and the baby acquires new skills. However, during such periods, a child might become fussy and sleep poorly.

We display growth crises in the calendar so you won't worry: together with pediatricians we explain what's happening with the physiology, motor skills, and speech development of your child up to 105 weeks inclusive.

MEASUREMENTS OF HEIGHT, WEIGHT, AND CIRCUMFERENCES
Fix key child's growth parameters – and track how they change. Check them with the World Health Organization's standards. 

TRACKERS FOR SLEEP, FEEDING, DIAPER CHANGES, PUMPING, AND CHILD'S MOOD
Record all the important information about your child's daily schedule and routine – all in one app.

230+ DEVELOPMENTAL EXERCISES FOR EVERY DAY
Tiger on a Branch, Maracas, More Noise, Miracles – these are not the titles of colorful children's cartoons, but engaging developmental exercises that you can perform with your child every day.

JOURNAL OF PRECIOUS MOMENTS
The first smile of your little one, the first tooth, the momentous first step – keep lovely memories not just in your heart. Record them in the app to create a cute video and share it on social media and messengers with family and friends. 

SUBSCRIPTION INFORMATION

The subscription provides access to additional services in the app, becoming your daily go-to parenting resource.

- A set of exercises for each day. They match the stage of your baby's development and don't take much time. The checklist format makes it easy to keep track of completed exercises.
- Developmental norms: cognitive and psychological, speech and motor skills, teething. Checked by pediatricians and approved by the World Health Organization.

Additional information:

- Payment will be charged to your Apple account after purchase confirmation. You could check the available subscription options in the app after its installation.
- The subscription automatically renews. The renewal cost will be charged to your account 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, if auto-renewal has not been turned off.
- You can easily manage subscriptions in your Apple account settings – for example, turn off automatic subscription renewal right after purchase.

More details: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039

FROM THE APP'S CREATOR 

Hello! My name is Dima, I am the father of a wonderful girl, Elli. 

When she was born, my whole world turned upside down. I learned about growth crises challenging for both the child and parents. To keep track of them, I created this app. Suddenly other parents started using it too. Today, thousands of moms and dads monitor their child's development with us – it's so inspiring, I'm so grateful. Thank you!


Growing up is not easy! But we support parents and children every day on this exciting journey.

Privacy Policy: https://sprouty.app/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://sprouty.app/terms-of-service

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

developer: MUTLU ISLER TEKNOLOJI VE ILETISIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LTD STI
description:
The Pedometer application, which counts your steps using the M7 and M8 (motion processor) motion processor in iPhone5S and higher model devices, will be your biggest assistant for a healthy life!

Features you can find in the application:

● With the application, you can measure how many steps you take daily, monthly and annually. Moreover, thanks to the graphs in the application, it is possible to measure how close you are to your goal and how far you have travelled. 

● You can create and share walking routes.

● You can do breathing exercises.

● You can also easily use the Water Diary, Weight Tracker, Calorie Counter features of the Pedometer application and get one step closer to your goals.

● You can reach your goals with us thanks to the daily notifications that encourage you to drink water and walk. 

● You can access the content we prepare for you every day with categories such as healthy content to help you lose weight, exercise plans and healthy life under the Blog tab. 

● You can also share your steps, distance travelled and calories burned on social media. 

● The Pedometer will be able to access your HealthKit data in order to transfer your movement data to the application.

Join the world’s largest walking community!
StepsApp turns your iPhone into a sleek, powerful step counter — no extra devices needed. 

Just slip your phone into your pocket and get moving.
Set goals. Count steps. Burn calories.

STEPSAPP INCLUDES

• Automatic step counting
• Stunning charts and animations
• NEW: Workouts with Map Tracking, Heart Rate Zones and Insights.
• Apple Health integration
• Apple Watch support
• Workouts with GPS tracking
• Active calories
• Insights
• Trends. Totals. Records.
• Powerful day, week, and month views
• Awards with 3D medals
• iOS 14 widgets for your home screen
• Dark and Light Mode
• Six beautiful colors – also change the app icon
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• More Daily goals & Notifications
• Social media sharing
• Wheelchair support
• Export data
• No extra hardware required

YOUR ACTIVITY AT A GLANCE

• Quick overview of your daily steps, distance, time, floors climbed, and active calories.
• Beautiful weekly, monthly, and yearly charts.
• See your progress directly in the today widget.
• Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the app icon.
• Notifications when you have reached your daily activity goal.
• Weekly Report
• Set and reach your goal… step by step.

APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH

• Synchronize and import your activity data via Apple Health.
• Track your activity with your iPhone and your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp will merge your steps automatically.
• Now with Apple Watch workouts with GPS tracking.
• Securely store your actively burned calories in Apple Health.

STEPSAPP FOR EVERYONE

• Also enjoy StepsApp with VoiceOver.
• Instead of steps, track wheelchair pushes with your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp supports more than 20 languages.

CUSTOMIZE & SHARE

• Spice up your charts with six beautiful colors.
• Also change the App Icon
• Share your achievements on social media directly from  StepsApp...
• …or with our brand new iMessage app!

Your activity tracker to form a habit of walking, running, hiking 
and weight loss.

StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy

* StepsApp requires iPhone 5s or newer

Bu uygulama GymTekno yönetim sistemine kayıtlı Fitness Salonlarının yönetim işlemlerini kayıt ve kontrol altında tutabileceği aynı zamanda kayıtlı abonelerine kısıtlı kullanımına sunabileceği bir yönetim uygulamasıdır.

Hiwell is a secure software chosen by more than 1 million users. By finding the right clinical psychologist and dietitian for you, you can start feeling better both mentally and physically today!


With Hiwell, used by more than 2,000 expert clinical psychologists and psychiatrists, you can access online psychological support and psychiatry services based on scientific approaches for anxiety, stress, unhappiness, relationship and work problems, and other well-being needs. You can also get support from professional dietitians to reach your nutrition goals.

Hiwell psychologists are therapists trained and specialized in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy (CBT), Dynamic Therapy, Interpersonal Therapy, Schema Therapy, and other psychotherapy methods.

Hiwell psychiatrists are medical doctors who have completed specialization in psychiatry.


All psychologist, psychiatrist, and dietitian sessions are conducted with 100% confidentiality and security. None of the sessions can be viewed or recorded by third parties. All payments are processed through encrypted pages.

What Does Hiwell Offer?


Online Psychologist
Online psychologists using Hiwell’s infrastructure are recognized in Türkiye and have passed thorough evaluations and interviews.
After selecting the psychologist that suits you best, you can have a free 15-minute video call to test your compatibility and ask questions about the support process.

Online Psychiatrist
With Hiwell’s expert psychiatrists, you can consult online, undergo an evaluation, and confidently start a treatment process tailored to your needs. With flexible appointment options, you can easily access professional support anytime, anywhere, and consult with your doctor.


E-Prescription*
E-Report*


*It applies in cases your doctor deems necessary.


Online Dietitian – New
Now you can also receive online nutrition counseling from expert dietitians on Hiwell. With personalized nutrition plans, flexible appointment hours, and ongoing follow-up support, you can take steps toward a sustainable lifestyle.


You can also have a free 15-minute video call with your dietitian to test compatibility and ask questions.


Why Hiwell?
Hiwell’s advanced algorithm, based on your registration answers, matches you with the most suitable therapists and psychiatrists according to your expectations, needs, and schedule, and dietitians according to your nutrition goals.

With the mission of making psychological support, psychiatry, and dietitian consultations accessible to everyone, Hiwell leverages technology to provide professional online services worldwide at affordable prices.

Through Hiwell’s free psychological tests, you can gain awareness about anxiety, low mood, social anxiety, phobias, alcohol use, traumatic grief, post-traumatic stress, self-esteem, attention difficulties, and more. You can then discuss these issues with your psychologist during therapy sessions or with your psychiatrist during consultations.
You also get free access to a rich content library written by expert psychologists, psychiatrists, and dietitians.

With psychologists on Hiwell’s platform, you can safely access adult therapy, couples therapy, and child & adolescent therapy, and with psychiatrist doctors, you can access psychiatric consultations.

From dietitians, you can get support for healthy weight management, PCOS, thyroid, insulin resistance, diabetes, sports nutrition, pregnancy and breastfeeding nutrition, vegan/vegetarian diets, child & adolescent nutrition, and personalized meal plans.

Contact Us

You can reach us via the Client Support Line or by emailing hello@hiwellapp.com for questions, feedback, or to apply as a psychologist / psychiatrist doctor / dietitian.

Discover the best app for gym exercise and workout enthusiasts! Lightweight! combines fitness workout science with practical tools for strength training, muscle building, bodybuilding, and powerlifting. Master your gym workouts and build muscle effectively with expert guidance and clear exercise demos. Start training smarter today!

Lightweight! lets you explore all exercises and workout routines with no ads or fees. Clear gym videos and handy tips make it a great companion for weightlifters who want to build strength and stay motivated every day.

Effortless Muscle Building & Exercise Discovery

Just tap on the muscle group you want to work, and you’ll find plenty of gym exercises tailored to that area. From core and abs workouts to leg and glute exercises, Lightweight helps you train every muscle effectively — ideal for those looking to follow anatomy exercises or train by muscle with precision.

Use the powerful fitness filter to customize workouts and find exactly what you need for your gym training or home workout sessions. The app supports training by muscle, helping you focus precisely where you want to build muscle and strength using structured anatomy exercises.

Scientifically Backed Workouts & Exercise Safety

Every exercise includes precise gym videos demonstrating correct and incorrect form — ensuring exercise safety so you train effectively and avoid injury. Benefit from detailed muscle engagement heat maps and fatigue scores that reveal how hard each muscle works during your lifts.

This is real strength training science made simple, supporting your journey to build muscle, improve your strength progression, and maximize your powerlifting or bodybuilding potential. Lightweight! blends exercise science with strength-focused tools to support your muscle-building journey and help you train smarter through proven workout routines.

Organize & Track Your Gym Routine

Organize your favorite exercises into custom folders and design workout routines that fit your style. Build a core workout, powerlifting plan, or traditional bodybuilding split with the help of exercise picker and customizer tools.

Lightweight! may not be a full workout tracker, but it gives you just enough to keep an effective workout log or exercise log. Build simple gym routines, follow your strength progression, and stay focused without any distractions.

Track Your Strength Benchmarks

Put your strength to the test with key lifts like squat, bench press, deadlift, and pull-ups. Track your one-rep max, powerlifting total, and Lightweight Score to see where you stand. Record videos of your personal records and compete with others to reach the top spots on the leaderboard.

Monitor Your Body Metrics

Your strength training deserves real feedback. Monitor muscle and strength gains with body metrics like fat percentage, muscle mass, and weight changes. Lightweight gives you the tools to reflect, adjust, and get closer to your goals each week.

More Features for serious weightlifters

• High-quality gym videos for every exercise, showing proper form and common mistakes
• Advanced fitness filters for equipment, muscle group, and workout type
• Create and save custom workout routines with your preferred gym exercises
• Insights into muscle fatigue and engagement to optimize your workout log
• Leaderboards and powerlifting scoring to compete with other users
• Choose between dark and light modes to match your training environment
• 100% free and ad-free — no distractions, just pure fitness focus

Download Lightweight! today and elevate your gym training with smarter workout routines, expert gym video support, and proven strength training tools. Track your progress, improve your strength log, and build muscle the right way. Your next-level fitness workout journey starts now!

Introducing Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker, designed to track your daily routine, habits, rituals and tasks to organize your days efficiently with useful to do lists and fun tips.

Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker isn't just a digital journal; it's your comprehensive organizer, a life-enriching checklist, and a schedule planner finely tuned to your unique needs, offering useful support. More importantly, it allows you to become a better version of yourself and elevate your life to extraordinary heights with its self care rituals. As a result, self-love sprouts in no time.

Benefits of Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker: 


• Start your mornings with a reminder towards rituals that set a foundation for a day full of achievements and self care.
• Get the perfect routine ideas, involving essentials like meditation, exercise, self care, reading, cleaning, and even pet care.
• Tailor your tasks, lists, and schedules to resonate with your ambitions, transforming each day into a stepping stone towards the person you desire to become.
• Track your progress with useful to do lists.

Let Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker serve as your motivational organizer that boosts your self improvement, ensuring your to-do list doesn't just stay managed but inspires action.
Whether it's completing your daily tasks, keeping tabs on your agenda, or embedding self care practices into your schedule, "Dear Me" guarantees that no detail is overlooked.
For those navigating the complexities of ADHD, “Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker” proves to be a sanctuary. It simplifies tasks into manageable segments, punctuated with reminders, helping in sustaining focus and organization.

This planner respects your rhythm, molds to your lifestyle, and provides the subtle encouragement needed without overwhelming you.
Get “Dear Me: Daily Routine Tracker” and unlock the transformative power of tracking, all within arm's reach. Nurture your habits and rituals that sculpt the finest version of you.

Step up your fitness game with Sweatcoin! 

Looking for a fun way to boost your fitness & get rewarded? Sweatcoin, the viral walking app, is here to transform your steps into real-world rewards! Earn Sweatcoins with every step you take and redeem them for exclusive gadgets, sports gear, and amazing experiences in our marketplace! 

The more you walk, the more you earn! And the more you earn, the more you walk! 


Discover the benefits:

- Effortless step tracking: Sweatcoin’s pedometer runs smoothly in the background, tracking your steps accurately without draining your battery. It’s your perfect fitness companion, whether you’re walking, running, or working out at home.

- Unlock rewards: Use your sweatcoins to access incredible offers and discounts that you won’t find anywhere else. Your fitness journey has never been so rewarding!

- Get moving, get badges: Hit your daily step goals and collect unique badges for each milestone achieved.

- Calling all streak masters: Compete with friends to see who can maintain the longest step streak. Fitness is more fun with a little friendly competition!


Features

Privacy first: We use a secure, proprietary algorithm to count your steps. Your location and personal data stay private—only you have access to your information.
Pedometer: Accurate step tracking with minimal battery usage.
Device compatibility: Available on iOS devices. Apple Watch users can also enjoy Sweatcoin.

"Annelik Yolculuğu" Mobil Sağlık Uygulaması, gebelik, doğum, lohusalık ve 0-2 yaş arası bebeklik dönemi ile ilgili genel bilgilendirme amacı taşır. Uygulama içeriğinde yer alan bilgi ve görseller, tanı koymak, tedavi başlatmak ya da sağlık izlemi yapmak amacıyla kullanılamaz.
Her gebelik ve bebek gelişimi, kendi özel koşulları içinde değerlendirilmelidir. Bu nedenle gebelik takiplerinin, doğum sonrası kontrollerin ve bebek izlem randevularının aksatılmaması büyük önem taşır. Akut veya kronik herhangi bir sağlık sorunu durumunda, mutlaka uzman sağlık personeline başvurulmalıdır.
Uygulamada sunulan bilgiler, ailelerin bu süreci daha bilinçli ve güvenli bir şekilde takip etmesine destek olmayı amaçlar; ancak profesyonel sağlık danışmanlığının yerini tutmaz.

Sağlıklı günler dileriz.

Struggling to fall asleep or stay asleep?

Sleepway makes bedtime simple with calming sounds, soothing white noise, guided meditation, and an easy sleep tracker & recorder. Drift off faster, sleep deeper, and wake up refreshed every morning.

Relax Instantly with Sounds & Meditation

Unwind with peaceful sounds, meditation tracks, and white noise designed to quiet your mind. Choose from nature sounds, soft music, or classic white noise — all crafted to help you relax, meditate, and sleep better.

Create Your Own Perfect Sound Mix

Don’t just listen — design your sleep environment. Combine sounds like rain, ocean waves, or birdsong with white noise and meditation music to build your personal soundscape. Every sound helps you find calm, focus, and rest.

Track & Record Your Nights

Sleepway is more than a sleep tracker. It’s also a powerful recorder that captures nighttime sounds like snoring, talking, or yawning. Together, the sleep tracker and recorder reveal how you sleep, while meditation and white noise help you improve it.

Discover Insights That Matter

With Sleepway’s sleep tracker, see how long you slept, view your patterns, and check what the recorder picked up during the night. Use these insights along with calming sounds, meditation, and white noise to build healthier sleep habits.

Simple, Sound-Centered Design

Sleepway keeps everything easy. Browse the sound library, enjoy meditation sessions, mix soothing sounds with white noise, and access your sleep tracker & recorder — all in a clean and intuitive interface.

Sleep Notes & Sleep Factors: Keep a mini journal before bed and log factors that may affect your sleep — like coffee, alcohol, stress, or light exposure. Combine your notes with Sleepway’s sleep tracker and recorder to see how these factors impact your nights.

Wake-Up Mood Log & Graphs: Track how you feel each morning. Record your wake-up mood and follow your patterns over time with simple, easy-to-read graphs. Pair this with meditation and calming sounds to improve both sleep and mornings.

Breathwork & Heart Rate Tracking: Sleepway links breathwork directly to your heart rate tracker. If your heart rate is elevated, the app guides you through calming breathing exercises. With sound therapy, meditation, and white noise, you’ll lower stress and prepare for deeper sleep.


With Sleepway, you can:

Sleep better with meditation, calming sounds, and white noise.

Personalize your experience using unique sound mixes.

Use the sleep tracker & recorder to understand your nights.

Improve your overall health with deeper, restorative sleep.

Download Sleepway today and unlock better nights with meditation, sound therapy, white noise, and the most intuitive sleep tracker & recorder.

developer: BABYPRO Bilisim Teknolojileri Ticaret ve Sanayi Limited Sirketi
description:
Hamilelik planlamasından bebeğinizin gelişimine uzanan tüm ebeveynlik serüveninizde yanınızda olan Babysfer, hamilelik sürecinizi ve bebeğinizin ilk yıllarını kolayca takip etmenizi sağlayan kapsamlı bir ebeveynlik uygulamasıdır. Annelerin ve babaların ihtiyaçları düşünülerek Türkçe olarak geliştirilen Babysfer, hem bilimsel bilgileri hem de pratik çözümleri tek bir platformda sunuyor.

Öne Çıkan Özellikler


Kişiselleştirilmiş Haftalık İçerikler
- Her hamilelik ve bebek gelişim haftasına özel bilgiler
- Anneye ve bebeğe dair özelleştirilmiş içerikler
- Video ve görseller ile zenginleştirilmiş haftalık gelişim bilgileri

Kapsamlı Takip Araçları
- Beslenme takibi: Emzirme, mama ve sıvı alımını kolayca kaydedin
- Uyku takibi: Bebeğinizin uyku düzenini izleyin
- Gelişim takibi: Boy, kilo ve baş çevresi ölçümlerini grafiklerle görüntüleyin
- Ateş takip günlüğü: Vücut sıcaklığını farklı ölçüm bölgelerine göre kaydedin
- İlaç ve aşı hatırlatmaları: Önemli sağlık olaylarını asla kaçırmayın

Sağlık ve Güvenlik Asistanları
- Doğum tarihi hesaplayıcı: Son adet tarihinize göre doğum tarihinizi öğrenin
- Doğum planı oluşturma: Tercihlerinizi belirleyin ve sağlık ekibinizle paylaşın
- Hastane çantası kontrol listesi: Doğum için gerekli tüm malzemeleri düzenleyin
- Çocuk güvenliği kontrol listesi: Yaş gruplarına göre ev ve çevre güvenliği önerileri

Ebeveynlik Kolaylaştırıcıları
- İsim bulucu: Bebeğiniz için mükemmel ismi keşfedin ve favorilere ekleyin
- Kontraksiyon sayacı: Doğum sancılarınızın süresini ve sıklığını ölçün
- Alerji takip günlüğü: Olası alerjenleri ve reaksiyonları kaydedin
- Diş çıkarma takvimi: Bebeğinizin gelişim sürecini izleyin

Çoklu Çocuk Yönetimi
- Birden fazla çocuk için ayrı profiller oluşturun
- Hamilelik ve bebek gelişimi verilerini ayrı ayrı takip edin
- Her çocuk için özelleştirilmiş takvimlere ve hatırlatıcılara erişin

Akıllı Hatırlatmalar
- Aşı takviminizi kişiselleştirin ve hatırlatmalar alın
- İlaç saatlerini planlamayı ve takip etmeyi unutmayın
- Doktor randevuları ve önemli tarihler için bildirimler alın

Kullanıcı Dostu Arayüz
Babysfer, karmaşık bilgileri ve takip verilerini anlaşılır ve kullanımı kolay bir arayüzle sunar. Sezgisel tasarımı sayesinde tüm özelliklere hızlıca erişebilir, kayıtlarınızı kolayca tutabilir ve bebeğinizin gelişimini görsel grafiklerle takip edebilirsiniz.

Güvenli ve Gizli
Kişisel sağlık verilerinizin güvenliği bizim için önceliklidir. Babysfer, tüm verilerinizi güvenle saklar ve korunmanızı sağlar.

Ebeveynler İçin Tasarlandı
Babysfer'in amacı, hamilelik planlamasından başlayarak bebek bakımına kadar uzanan süreçte sizi desteklemek, bilgilendirmek ve ebeveynlik yolculuğunuzda size rehberlik etmektir. 


Hamilelik ve ebeveynlik sürecinizde yanınızda olmaktan mutluluk duyuyoruz! Babysfer ile bu güzel yolculuğun tüm anlarını güvenle kaydedin ve bebeğinizin büyüme serüveninin tadını çıkarın.

Önemli Uyarı: Bu uygulamadaki bilgiler, Uzm. Dr. Osman GÖNÜLAL tarafından hazırlanmıştır. Ancak, bu uygulama bir doktorun tavsiyesinin yerine geçmez. Herhangi bir tıbbi karar vermeden önce bir doktora danışın.

Kullanım Şartları (EULA): https://www.babysfer.com/kullanici-sozlesmesi
Gizlilik Sözleşmesi: https://www.babysfer.com/gizlilik-sozlesmesi

---

SOCIFLY tarafından geliştirildi.
